IBM Virtualization - HMC CLIs

  1. List all the frames on an HMC 
     lssyscfg -r sys -F name
  2. List all lpars on a frame 
     lssyscfg -r lpar -m <frame_name>
  3. Turn on an lpar
    chsysstate -m taitc111-9111-520-SN10B49FD -r lpar -o on -n taitc111-reverseauction

In house developed tools

  1. Turn off/on an lpar from NIM server pgnmsv01
    /usr/local/scripts/manage_lpar <lpar_name> <on/off>

    If you have a bunch of lpars to power off immediately 

    /usr/local/scripts/manage_lpar <lpar_name> <on/off> force
